text: Great place to service my vehicle. Friendly boss, reasonable servicing fee. My car was having noise at the brake whenever I reversed my car but no issue when I drive forward. The boss told me that it is a brake pad issue and explained to me how the brake calipers actually works. Thumb up.
Professional service and passionate staff. Prices are very competitive as well. worth coming here for a visit.
Excellent service. They even have a nice lounge area for you to relax in.
Messy garage but nice and friendly staff always helpful and doing more than requested foc
